title: [综合|安全|经济|传送|管理]EssentialsGree —— 绿色简化版的ESS[1.83]
author: 914554688wyt
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 07:23 编辑 
本帖将持续更新
EssentialsGreen
绿色简化版的ESS基础插件（仅包括ESS主体，不包括GroupManager等附属） (处于开发中状态，一些细节部分正在完工中) 
This Plugin is for the Spigot/Bukkit 1.8.3!

This Plugin exist for Sponge
该插件适用于水龙头/水桶的1.83
同时兼容Sponge  
Go To Sponge Version

功能
支持的功能看起来就是一个小型的ES

命令与权限列表
大部分命令都与ESS使用方法相同

Default Permmsions | EssentialsGreen.DefaultPermmision
/gamemode <Mode> [Player] | EssentialsGreen.gamemode/give <Player> <ID | Materiel> | EssentialsGreen.give/gm <Mode> [Player] | EssentialsGreen.gamemode/kick <Player> <Reason> | EssentialsGreen.kick/ban <Player> <Reason> | EssentialsGreen.ban/unban <Player> | EssentialsGreen.unban/banlist | EssentialsGreen.banlist/actionbar <Player> <Message> | EssentialsGreen.actionbar/tp <target> or /tp <Player> <target>| EssentialsGreen.tp/msg <Player> <Message> | EssentialsGreen.msg/time <set|add> <Time> | EssentialsGreen.time/broadcast <Message>| EssentialsGreen.broadcast/spawn | EssentialsGreen.spawn/setspawn | EssentialsGreen.setspawn/xp | EssentialsGreen.xp/fly [Player]| EssentialsGreen.fly/say <Message>| EssentialsGreen.say/invsee <Player> | EssentialsGreen.invsee/heal [Player] | EssentialsGreen.heal/nick <name|off>/kill <Player|@e|@a>/setworldspawn | EssentialsGreen.setworldspawn/seed [World] | EssentialsGreen.seed/clear [Player] | EssentialsGreen.clear/list | EssentialsGreen.list/rl | EssentialsGreen.ReloadServer/stop | EssentialsGreen.StopServer/heal | EssentialsGreen.Heal/skull | EssentialsGreen.skull/spawnmob | EssentialsGreen.spawnmob/spawnpoint | EssentialsGreen.spawnpoint/warp | EssentialsGreen.Warp.<Warpname|Options|*>/whitelist | EssentialsGreen.Whitelist/defaultgamemode | EssentialsGreen.defaultgamemode/effect | EssentialsGreen.effect/eg | NoPermmsions
EssentialsGreen Subcommands/eg info | No Permmision/eg reload | EssentialsGreen.reload/eg reloadGroupPrefix | NoPermmsion [Permmsion in comming]
EssentialsGreen Sign Create PermmisionsFree Sign | EssentialsGreen.create.FreeSignCommand Sign | EssentialsGreen.create.CommandSignWarp Sign | EssentialsGreen.create.WarpSign

Apis
开发者需要使用到的API页面——戳我 Apis

木牌教程
Sign Tutorial Link

GitHub源代码 GitHub

下载地址：
http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plu ... ntials-green-v-3-2/
